title: Trump is desperate for trade war victories as election draws nearer
text:
‘China has already begun agricultural purchases from our great patriot farmers & ranchers!” the president proclaimed. What he meant was: the chances of America’s farmers voting for him next year just went up.

China and the US have called a truce in their trade war and markets have rallied, as usual. This is supposedly the “first stage” of a broader agreement, still to be thrashed out in the coming months, but it is the most positive sign of progress since the spring, when they failed to clinch a widely expected deal.

It’s too early to celebrate, though. Both China and the US might be feeling the pain from slowing global trade, but the US is still very far from landing the comprehensive deal that...
description: ‘China has already begun agricultural purchases from our great patriot farmers & ranchers!
